RudeTweaks.FixCombatInitiative_Hint: Fixes combat initiative; resetting the combat tracker back to turn 0 when initiatives are finished on round 1.
RudeTweaks.HideAttackRollResult_Hint: Hides whether or not an attack roll hits.
RudeTweaks.SensibleDefaults_Hint: Sets certain client side settings that should be set.
